title: TFR Ep. 627: Amsterdam, Hellraiser, Ginger Snaps, 5 Favorite 80’s Horror Monsters
description:
This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt dive in to the A-Lister stuffed latest from David O. Russell, ‘Amsterdam’. Then we open the LeMarchand box and experience the ickiest of dubious pleasures with Hulu’s ‘Hellraiser’ remake/reboot. But wait there’s more! Our spooky season werewolf marathon continues with ‘Ginger Snaps’, a film that sets out to prove there is truly nothing so terrifying as a teenage girl. There’s the life-changing rundown of the big releases on physical media, featuring the Streaming and DVD Picks of the Week. Then Matt and Chris wrap it all up with their 5 Favorite Movie Monsters of the 80’s. So light ‘em if you got and join us down to the red-light district for another episode of The First Run!

00:00-17:34: Intro/Amsterdam

17:35-31:02: Hellraiser (22)

31:03-41:57: Physical Media Picks

41:58-51:22: Ginger Snaps

51:23-1:02:14: 5 Favorite 80’s Movie Monsters

1:02:15-1:04:57: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey
